INTERSHOP IOM 5.2.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 6edb3d8be162fde081a9e6e668ef11ddc3664951)

Table oms.DocumentFormatDefDO (Enum)

Document formats including related encodings, mime-types and transformer factories.

Document formats are for example pdf, xml.
Document encodings are for example utf-8.
Transformer factories are used to transform data and/ or templates to a final document. E.g. to a pdf.
Mime-types are for example "application/pdf", "application/xml".

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
description varchar  
encoding varchar(10) NOT_NULL  
format varchar(20) NOT_NULL  
name varchar(25) UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
transformerFactory varchar(200)

PK : the column is part of the primary key
